verses.text: Out of the \w depths|strong="H4615"\w* have I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: let thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* be \w attentive|strong="H7183"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*.
If thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*, shouldest \w mark|strong="H8104"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, who shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*?
But \add there is\add* \w forgiveness|strong="H5547"\w* with thee, that thou mayest be \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*.

I \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* doth \w wait|strong="H6960"\w*, and in his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* do I \w hope|strong="H3176"\w*.

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add waiteth\add* for the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* more than they that \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* for the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: \add I say, more than\add* they that \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* for the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 130.6 \ft I sayâ€¦: or, which watch unto\f*

Let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for with the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add there is\add* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, and with him \add is\add* \w plenteous|strong="H7235"\w* \w redemption|strong="H6304"\w*.
And he shall \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from all his \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.
